# r2dii.climate.stress.test <a href='https://github.com/2DegreesInvesting/r2dii.climate.stress.test'><img src='https://imgur.com/A5ASZPE.png' align='right' height='43' /></a>

The goal of r2dii.climate.stress.test is to calculate market and credit risk for listed equity, corporate bonds and corporate loans.
In order to analyses sensitivities the several model parameters can be altered.


## Installation

Install the development version of r2dii.climate.stress.test from GitHub with:

```r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("2DegreesInvesting/r2dii.climate.stress.test")
```

## Example

```{r example}
## run stress testing for asset of type listed equity using default parameters
library(r2dii.climate.stress.test)
run_stress_test(asset_type_arg = "equity")

## run stress testing for asset of type corporate bond using various shock years to analyse sensitivities
run_stress_test(asset_type_arg = "bonds", shock_year_arg = c(2025:2035))

## run stress testing for asset of type corporate loans using various risk free rates to analyse sensitivities
run_stress_test(asset_type_arg = "bonds", shock_year_arg = c(2025:2035))
```
